ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c, 'Onboarding Complete'), NOT(Ready_for_Submission__c = 1.0), OR (ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, 'AOR'), ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, 'AOR and New Case'), ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, 'AOR with Renewal'), ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, 'New Case'), ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, 'Renewal within 30 days'), ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, 'Renewal within 60 days'), ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, 'Renewal within 90 days')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ready for submission should be 100% to change current step to Onboarding Complete
